mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET complete_count = complete_count + 1, status = CASE WHEN complete_count + 1 = target_count THEN 'SUCCESS' ELSE status END, completed_time = CASE WHEN complete_count + 1 = target_count THEN NOW() ELSE completed_time END, update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status = 'PENDING' AND complete_count < target_count AND deadline_time > NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND deadline_time < NOW()
SELECT o.* FROM `order` o INNER JOIN activity a ON o.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE o.status = 'PENDING' AND o.deadline_time < NOW() AND a.group_type = 0
